---

## Props

### Animation Control
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| `speed` | any | 1 | Yes | Controls the playback speed of the animation. Values greater than 1 increase speed, values less than 1 decrease speed. |
| `autoplay` | any | false | Yes | Determines whether the animation starts playing automatically when the component loads. |
| `loop` | any | false | Yes | Controls whether the animation repeats continuously after completion. |

### Content
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| `source` | string | '' | Yes | Path or URL to the Lottie animation file (JSON format). |

### Inherited Props
| Prop | Type | Default | Inherited From | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------------|-------------|
| `id` | string | null | BaseProps | Unique identifier for the component instance. |
| `name` | string | null | BaseProps | Name attribute for the component, useful for form handling or identification. |
| `disabled` | any | false | BaseProps | Prevents user interaction with the component when set to true. |
| `show` | any | true | BaseProps | Controls component visibility. Accepts boolean, string, or number values. |
| `styles` | any | null | BaseProps | Custom styling object to override default component appearance. |
| `classname` | string | null | BaseProps | Additional CSS class names to apply to the component. |
| `showindevice` | ('xs'\|'sm'\|'md'\|'lg'\|'xl'\|'xxl')[] | null | BaseProps | Array of device breakpoints where the component should be visible. |
| `showskeleton` | boolean | undefined | BaseProps | Displays a skeleton loading state while content is being loaded. |
| `disabletoucheffect` | boolean | false | BaseProps | Disables touch feedback effects on mobile devices. |

## Methods

| Method | Parameters | Return Type | Description |
|--------|------------|-------------|-------------|
| `play()` | none | void | Starts or resumes animation playback from the current position. |
| `pause()` | none | void | Pauses the animation at the current frame without resetting. |
| `reset()` | none | void | Stops the animation and returns it to the first frame. |
| `onPropertyChange()` | name: string, $new: any, $old: any | void | Internal method triggered when component properties change. Used for property binding and state management. |

## Events

| Event | Parameters | Description |
|-------|------------|-------------|
| `onPlay` | null, this.proxy | Fired when the animation starts playing, either through autoplay or manual play() call. |
| `onPause` | null, this.proxy | Fired when the animation is paused via the pause() method. |
| `onReady` | null, this.proxy | Fired when the Lottie animation file has loaded successfully and is ready for playback. |
| `onComplete` | null, this.proxy | Fired when the animation reaches the end, regardless of loop settings. |

## Style Classes

### Default Styling
- `app-lottie` - Base style class that provides default styling for the Lottie animation container.
